original_text: Because the king's order was urgent and the furnace overheated, the flame of the fire killed those men who took up Shadrach, Meshach, and Abednego.
korean_text: 왕의 명령이 엄하고 풀무불이 심히 뜨거우므로 불꽃이 사드락과 메삭과 아벳느고를 붙든 사람을 태워 죽였고

sentences.original_text: Because the king's order was urgent
the flame of the fire killed those men
who took up Shadrach, Meshach, and Abednego
